scripts.build: npm run lint:sass --silent && npm run lint:js --silent && npm run clean && middleman build
scripts.build:sass:prod: node-sass $npm_package_config_sass_src --output-style compressed | postcss --no-map --use autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers "> 5% in JP, last 2 versions" --output $npm_package_config_sass_out
scripts.build:sass:tmp: node-sass $npm_package_config_sass_src --output-style compressed | postcss --no-map --use autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers "> 5% in JP, last 2 versions" --output $npm_package_config_sass_tmp
scripts.watch: nodemon -w src/sass -e scss -x 'npm run lint:sass --silent && npm run watch:sass' & nodemon -w $npm_package_config_js_src_dir -e js -x 'npm run lint:js --silent'
